sentences: Kui ma töö lõpetan, siis ajame veidi juttu.
Pärast seda, kui külalised olid lahkunud, heitsime magama.
Ma ei oska öelda, kui palju see maksab.
context: The word 'lõpetan' is the first person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'lõpetama', which means 'to finish' or 'to complete'. It appears in dictionary definitions where it's used in example sentences showing temporal clauses. For instance, 'Kui ma töö lõpetan, siis ajame veidi juttu' translates to 'When I finish work, then we'll talk a bit.' This verb is commonly used when referring to the completion of an action or task.
